+
'''Joseph Girzone''' (Born [[1930]]), a best-selling American [[:Category:Writers|writer]], is the author of the popular and inspirational ''Joshua'' series. Girzone was born in [[Albany, New York]] to parents Peter and Margaret Girzone. He entered the [[Carmelite Order]] in [[1948]] and was ordained as a [[Catholic]] [[Priest]] in [[1955]]. After seving as pastor as various New York churches, he retired from the active priesthood in [[1981]]. Following his retirement, he embarked on a second career as a full-time writer and speaker. Joseph Girzone now lives in [[Altamont, New York]].
